Class dom.session.DObjectRunner 

java.lang.Object
    |
    +----dom.session.DObjectRunner
public class DObjectRunner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
A Runnable class to provide the behavior for DObject message processing. This is the actual message processing loop for all DObjects. The thread created by the View (upon request of a newly constructed DObject) is passed an instance of this class, and the run method below is what the given Thread executes. In this implementation, the thread simply peels instances of the Closure class off of the given Queue object, and calls the 'runClosure' method on the owning DObject with the given Closure. If an exception occurs, the DObject's handleMessageException method is called to deal with the problem.
